Verification Code
We\'ll send you a text message with a unique verification code. Just tell us which number to send the text to.
Sorry, we weren\'t able to confirm your information. \n\n To unlock your Security Key, tap Unlock. Or go to your Profile on the PayPal Website
Need help\?
Sorry, we don\'t support the old PayPal Security Key device in the app. But you can get the new digital version on your phone.
Unlock

Code sent
Please wait...
We\'re automatically verifying the verification code from the text message we sent to %1$s.
Would you like to call us on

You can call us from 8am to 10pm Monday to Friday, 8am to 9pm Saturday, 9am to 9pm Sunday. Freephone from a UK landline. However, costs from mobiles may apply and are dependent on the terms of agreement with your network provider. If you\'re calling from outside the UK, please call 00353 1 436 9004 (international call charges may apply).
Keeping Your Account More Secure
It looks like you\'re logging in from a new device. Please confirm you own this account so we know it\'s you.
Confirm Your Identity
Loading
Link your fingerprint to your PayPal account.
Use your fingerprint for faster, easier access to your PayPal account.
You can now log in using your fingerprint.
We can\'t confirm your fingerprint
We\'re having trouble confirming your fingerprint at the moment.
Have a Security Key\? You won\'t have to use this when you log in with your fingerprint on this device.
All of the fingerprints stored on this device can be used to log in to your PayPal account.
Fingerprint recognised
Fingerprint not recognised. Try again.
No, It\'s Not Me
Your security is our priority

Not me
Yes, that\'s me
Login cancelled
Okay, let\'s log you in another way. Please go to the browser on your device to continue.

We stopped the payment to %1$s
We stopped a %1$s payment to %2$s on %3$s at %4$s
It looked suspicious, so we contacted you straight away. For your security, we stopped the payment because we didn\'t hear back from you.
If you don\'t recognise this payment, change your password.
We stopped this payment

We stopped this payment
There\'s currently a problem with your account. For your security, we stopped your payment to %1$s.
Are you trying to log in from another device at the moment\?
We\'ve stopped that login attempt
We contacted you because we didn\'t recognise the device. We stopped the login because we didn\'t hear back from you.
We\'re sorry, you didn\'t confirm in time. Please try again.
When we see suspicious activity on your account, we contact you straight away to confirm it\'s you.
There\'s currently a problem with your account. For your security, we stopped the login.
For help, please log in to your PayPal account from this device or call us.
Are you trying to log in from %1$s at the moment \?
• No need to enter your email address or password. When you activate One Touch™, you\'ll be logged in automatically when you check out on this device.
• Quickly review your shipping and payment details to pay on millions of websites with PayPal.

• For security purposes, we\'ll occasionally ask you to log in, including every time you update your personal or financial information. We don\'t recommend using One Touch™ on shared devices. Turn this off at any time in your PayPal Settings.
You can turn this feature off at any time.
Turn It On
Please take a moment to confirm your device. This lets us know it\'s really you using PayPal and helps protect you against fraud.
Call us to confirm your information
It looks like we need to do this another way. Please call us and we\'ll help get you set up to use this feature.
Confirm your information before you continue
Please take a moment to provide some information that\'s required to use this feature.
We need help confirming your identity. Please visit the Resolution Centre at paypal.com to complete the process.
We need a bit more information
Go to the Identity section in your Profile to send us the information.
Thanks. You\'ve confirmed your mobile number.
By continuing, you confirm that you\'re authorised to use this phone number and agree to receive a text.\nMobile network fees may apply.
Mobile network fees may apply.
Type in the confirmation code from the text message we sent to %1$s.
Please try again
Let\'s confirm your phone
We\'ve updated the app, and you\'ll need a confirmed phone number to use some of the cool new features.
Got it.
Try it out now
Login attempt cancelled
If you think there\'s a problem with your account, go to Settings and change your log in options.
If you think there\'s a problem with your account, go to Settings and change your log in options.
Login cancelled
Let\'s log you in another way. Go back to your browser to continue.
We\'re sorry, we can\'t confirm it\'s you
We\'re having trouble recognising your fingerprint at the moment.
We couldn\'t log you in to the web
We didn\'t receive a response from you so your request timed out.
Not me
Create Account
Reset Password
This just helps PayPal make sure it\'s you.
You can now see your balance and activity, send money to recent contacts, make purchases and more without logging in each time.

For your security, we\'ll occasionally ask you to log in, including every time you update your financial or account information. This feature isn\'t recommended for shared devices. You can revoke this permission at any time in your PayPal Settings.
Add Email Address
Receive Notifications
Let\'s make sure we can get in touch
We\'ll send you a push notification if there\'s an issue with your account or add your email address to allow you to update your profile.
